summary: To keep the loyalty of a village during the Vietnam war, a U.S. Army officer and his unit struggle to deliver it a live elephant.

keywords: asian elephant|riding an elephant|reference to elephant|reference to an elephant|rescued by elephant
title: Operación Elefante
